text: Cawthon is a surname of British origin. It is a variant of the toponymic surname Cawthorne. Cawthon may refer to: *Pete Cawthon (1898–1962), American football coach *Rainey Cawthon (1907–1991), American football player and coach *Scott Cawthon (born 1971), American video game designer ==See also== *Cawthorne (surname) ==References== Category:Surnames of British Isles origin
title: Cawthon
